# Templates & AI Notes

## Sample AI Prompts

### Simple
"Create a pipeline that summarizes text"

### Medium
"Create a pipeline that takes customer feedback, analyzes sentiment, and categorizes it"

### Complex
"Create an ETL pipeline that fetches data from an API, validates it against a schema, transforms it, and filters out invalid records"

## AI Generation Quality

Rate the quality of generated pipelines:
- [ ] Prompt understanding: ___/5
- [ ] Stage organization: ___/5
- [ ] Correct components: ___/5
- [ ] Reasonable defaults: ___/5
